channel.title: 718/742 Loyalty Titles

item.title: 718/742 Loyalty Titles
item.dc:creator: @I_InDrEk_I I InDrEk I
item.description:
@I_InDrEk_I wrote:

You should make a new string named userTitle and then find the place where it draws the username and just add it like this:

And then you could make it to your if statement:

if (username.equalsIgnoreCase("deadlyhorror")) { userTitle = "Lord"; }

Or you can place the userTitle into the character file and change it from there.

Read full topic

item.title: 718/742 Loyalty Titles
item.dc:creator: @deadlyhorror deadlyhorror
item.description:
@deadlyhorror wrote:

Hey I was just wundering if there was a way to make something like this:

if (username.equalsIgnoreCase("deadlyhorror")) { rights = 2; }

but for a loyalty title? Like so it’ll check if username = (whatever) then title = (whatever)

Sorry if this isn’t explained very well, I did the best I could -__-

Read full topic
